oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Carol Warren Oral History Interview, 2011 November 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Carol Warren conducted on November 03, 2011 by Bettina Warkentin as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Carol Warren is a musician whose Franklin home flooded during the May 2010 flood while she was playing a show in another state.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Warren, Carol--Interviews
